episodes_names: Tonight, the Spirits Will Be Resurrected!! Amanojaku

The Demon Hand That Tears Through Doors: Night of Tragedy
The Soul Stolen by the Mirror!! Utsushimi
The Circuits That Lead to Hell: The Ogre of the Underworld
The Corpse That Wanders the Night: Shirotabi
The Tunnel With No Exit: Anamaneki
The Talking Mary Doll: The Shadows of Horror
The Nurse Who Announces Death: A Mother's Feelings
The Painting Which Swallows People: da Vinci
The Ghost Photograph That Takes Lives: Railway Crossing of Evil
The Devil's Spell: Ritual of Darkness

The Horror of Bloodstained Lake!! The Snow Specter

Curse of Death The Headless Rider!!
